TextBody:
Hello Dhanush,

I wanted to check in regarding your support ticket 00421738. We haven’t heard from you in a while, and I just wanted to see if you still need assistance with this issue.
If you’re still experiencing problems or have any updates to share, please let me know. If the issue has been resolved, I can go ahead and close the ticket on my end.

Please feel free to reply to this email with any updates or questions. We’re here to help you get the most out of your Netwrix products.

Ticket Number: 00421738
Ticket Subject: Request for cleanup the old data
Ticket Details: Hi Team, As we checked there are more than 10000 machines that are unlicensed/offline on the console we need to validate and remove from the console on the backend.  Could you please schedule the call so that we can connect and close it ASAP.

Thank you!

Andre Le Roux
Technical Support Engineer
____________________ _________
Cybersecurity That Works for You

6160 Warren Parkway, Suite 100, Frisco, TX 75034
www.netwrix.com





--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: Netwrix Support [techsupport@netwrix.com]
Sent: 10/15/2024 5:00 PM
To: dhanush.a@swiggy.in
Cc: hina.kousar1@swiggy.in
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #421738 - - Request for cleanup the old data [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0G7RqH:ref ]

Hi Dhanush,

Thank you for confirming.  I have scheduled our remote session for tomorrow at 2:30 PM IST and sent you the calendar invitation.

Join Zoom Meeting
https://netwrix.zoom.us/j/85039831758?pwd=mdPUmAef2aPxXBXErwepfKViXZCla1.1




Kind regards
__________________
André Le Roux | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

Hi Dhanush,

A slot for 2:30 PM IST tomorrow was just made available after a client cancelled a scheduled session, can we schedule our session for this time tomorrow?  I'm afraid this is the earliest time that we can accommodate with a developer also joining in on the session.


Kind regards
__________________

Join Zoom Meeting
https://netwrix.zoom.us/j/81102934760?pwd=BaHvxizi0oK4Ci6gYFe66W1nKdRPCv.1


IMPORTANT:
Please perform a snapshot (Backup) in the virtualization platform of the current state of your Endpoint Protector appliance prior to our call.  This way you will have a safety measure and a quick way to revert back to the previous state in case anything goes wrong during the process.



Kind regards

I received an update earlier that our Dev team is currently looking into this, we will give you an update on this soon.



Kind regards

We can't go with GUi, we need to delete the data from the backend and it should not impact and same time we have to delete the data before May 2024 and at least keep the three-month data in place.

 

Could you please schedule the call now so that can connect and close it asap.

 

Regards,

Dhanush Kumar A

 

 

 

 


On Mon, Sep 23, 2024 at 1:37?PM Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:


Hello Dhanush,

Thank you for contacting the Netwrix Support support team.

This action can be done from the GUI by using the filters.  Apply a filter to show only "Unlicensed" and "Offline" computers, select all entries and then click on "Delete".



Please do let me know if you have any follow up questions or need any assistance.


Kind regards
__________________
André Le Roux | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com
